pull.title: Tests: Fix a comment
pull.body: Fix a comment that was false

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#14606](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/14606.html) (Tests: Consistency changes in comments by fridokus)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Please keep your commits squashed for trivial changes. See https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#squashing-commits

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -52,7 +52,7 @@ def run_test(self):
         for node in self.nodes:
             node.invalidateblock(blocks[0])
 
-        # mempool should be empty, all txns confirmed
+        # All txns should be back in mempool with 0 confirmations
comments.body: Could remove the comment, since it is mentioned two lines up already?
